post.body: Wow. Thanks! That's pretty much the coolest thing ever. You complete me.
LOL. You sir, win the internets.
I love it when people lose fantasy football matchups because of QB kneeldowns (negative rush yards). That's brutal.
Pics or it didn't happen.
Check out angry cat. http://tinyurl.com/38mqsg
How did you find that? Do you have a Google alert set up for "beaver news?" Pervert.
Luckily, there is no investment. Apple replaces them for free. It's just annoying.
redesigned our WBC website: www.wrightbroscom.com It's his first time designing a site. I'm impressed.
Wow. Vlingo is awesome. Good call.
Lot of late votes for twitizens. I think that's the winner in a close vote. That's the one I'm going with. Thanks for the help, twitizens.
LOL This is hopeless: http://tinyurl.com/a6mjrc
Okay, so let's get an official vote. The options are: a) tweeps b) twits c) twerps d) twitizens e) twitterati f) tweeple
Wow, some violent responses to the term "tweeple." I didn't make it up. If you have a better term for people on Twitter, let me know.
"dammit" is the top trending word on Twitter right now. A lot of frustrated tweeple in the world right now.
"Marge, it takes two to lie. One to lie and one to listen." -Homer SimpsonÂ
RT @joeschmitt Watching the Blagojevich conference, and all I can think is "Don't any of these reporters have shoes?"

Does anyone else find it odd that homeowners duped by subprimes are "complicit" while rich people duped by Madoff are "victims?"
Wife of Star Trek creator beamed up to heaven today. Nerds and virgins around the world mourn her death. 2 (bad) jokes in 1 tweet. Booyah!
You thought your Twitter addiction was bad? http://twitpic.com/tzw0
Just finished speaking to a great group in Chino. Long drive back to SD now--eyes peeled for an In-n-Out.
Top 10 Macworld 2009 rumors: http://bit.ly/wUgU
Headed to OC to watch my 1-year-old nephew for the day.
I just realized that I popped a blood vessel in one of my fingers from clapping so hard. It hurts to type. Ouch.
Darren Sproles = 100% pure awesomeness. What a game!
Go Chargers!

Looks like most people are expecting a Manning Bowl. I'm guessing the NFL (and it's TV affiliates) would love that.
Prediction time: What will the matchup be in this year's Super Bowl? Who will win?
My iPhone headphones stopped working again. This will be my 5th pair in less than 2 years. Anyone else having this problem?
